name: game i made in 2 days
description:
Similar to the 2 hour project, this is a Bytepath clone that I made in like 2 days with an hour each day

WASD or ARROWS you'll figure it out i promise

please comment your ideas and i will take the time to make them :D

you now unlock rapid and spread once hitting a high score of 50, hoping to add new enemy types at 250

for every single other person to get to 100 i will add a content piece of your choice (ex. weapon enemy etc) 10 to 100 and i will do something so bananas that you will LOSE IT
